Body: Possible Duplicate:  Difference between Super LCD screen of Nexus S and Super AMOLED screen of Samsung Galaxy S  On the US site of Nexus S they say it have Super AMOLED screen. In my country, Serbia, cell network is selling this phone but states that Nexus S have Super LCD screen. Do diferent Nexus S devices have different screens? Is Super LCD to bad comparing to Super AMOLED?
Title: Nexus S screen question

history.Text: On the US site of Nexus S they say it have Super AMOLED screen. In my country, Serbia, cell network is selling this phone but states that Nexus S have Super LCD screen. Do diferent Nexus S devices have different screens? Is Super LCD to bad comparing to Super AMOLED?

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [Difference between Super LCD screen of Nexus S and Super AMOLED screen of Samsung Galaxy S](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/7135/difference-between-super-lcd-screen-of-nexus-s-and-super-amoled-screen-of-samsung)  On the US site of Nexus S they say it have Super AMOLED screen. In my country, Serbia, cell network is selling this phone but states that Nexus S have Super LCD screen. Do diferent Nexus S devices have different screens? Is Super LCD to bad comparing to Super AMOLED?
